argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | pjpj.1 | |- H e. CH |
| 2 |  | pjpj.2 | |- A e. ~H |
| 3 |  | #P_axpjpj | |- ( ( H e. CH /\ A e. ~H ) -> A = ( ( ( projh ` H ) ` A ) +h ( ( projh ` ( _|_ ` H ) ) ` A ) ) ) |
| 4 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_mp2an | |- A = ( ( ( projh ` H ) ` A ) +h ( ( projh ` ( _|_ ` H ) ) ` A ) ) |
\
 Decomposition of a vector into projections.  (Contributed by NM, 26-Oct-1999.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-May-2014.) (New usage is discouraged.)
